About Me

My name is Austin Cordova. I am a recent graduate from the Road 2 Hire Tech Academy. I was introduced to programming when I was 16. At my old school I just scratched the serface of C++. I was so intrigued with C++ that I wanted to learn more. All the way until I ended up in Road 2 Hire.
